message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Take this small slice, but don't worry, I'm sure you'll get a better deal if you reject.
I propose a fairer split. Let's each take a bit over half, considering the value of the money will decrease with each passing round.
Bob, I understand your desire for a fair split, but let's be realistic. We're both losing money with each round. I'm offering you a decent share to keep the game moving forward.
Let's try to meet in the middle. I'm willing to give up a bit more, but we need to make progress to avoid losing more money.
